author: svn-role
msg: Include more information in the FSFS node-revision predecessors count sanity
Will make chasing down the bug easier.  (I mean, asking users to run a
Perl script that dumps node-revisions? Really?)

author: damjan
msg: Added support for symbolic color names in XPM files.
Imported rgb.txt from the X.org project to provide these,
and added its MIT license to LICENSE.txt.
Fixed some bugs in rgb.txt parsing.
Added a test image that uses a symbolic color.
